Summary
We are looking for a Sales & Service Cloud consultant who is skilled in the solution as well as has technical expertise to meet the demands of the customer implementation needs. This role will offer you 
•    To work on global Sales & Service Cloud implementations helping the customers streamline their sales & service processes
•    Opportunity to enhance your skills on other requisite areas to fast track your aspirations to become a Sales or Service Process Architect / CX Solution Architect
•    Fine tune your consulting skills with focused learning journeys suited to your needs and opportunities to explore various spheres of consultant journey
 The Role:This role will help you to enhance skills in the specialized solutions space of Sales Cloud and Service cloud while providing opportunities to explore other related solutions under CX portfolioThe Consultant expected toPerforms tasks involved in implementation of SAP CX solution as per customer requirements using predefined methodologies
Together with customer define futuristic business processes to cater to Sales & Service processes across industries
Establish relationships with customer and to deliver timely, high quality consulting services
develop functional as well as technical design based on the business requirements and to be able to translate the same into project deliverablesRole Requirements:3+ years of IT experience with 1 or 2 Full Life Cycle Implementations in the area of Sales& Service Cloud Solution/ Roll- Outs experience. 
C4C UI Concepts (screen configuration, layouts, business roles, and other concepts) 
SDK skills & Development experience
MCA / B.Tech or B.E
Good Presentation and communication skills with Fluent EnglishDesired/Preferred Additional expertiseExperience in other SAP CX solution is an added advantage
